name: (Phaser 3) Slot Machine - HTML5 Game
description:
A HTML5 Casino Slot game with 10 type of symbols. Put your bet, lines, and start spinning to try your lucky.

This game has been developed using Phaser 3, Phaser is a free open source HTML5 game framework http://phaser.io

By default, player can easily win, but you can costomize winning rate on game config.Features:

  • Fullscreen landscape
  • Potrait screen/window detection
  • HD (1600×720)
  • Sound and music (mp3)
  • Easy to customize
  • Cross platform
  • Performance optimized
  • Lightweight
  • 10 type of symbols
  • 10 type of lines
  • Quality assets
  • LocalStorage (save current player balance)
